channel.title: VCD on Grant Davis
channel.description: Recent content in VCD on Grant Davis

item.title: LBaaS with NSX Advanced Load Balancer and Cloud Director
item.description: NSX Advanced Load Balancer (ALB) is a software-based application delivery controller that provides load balancing capabilities for applications deployed in data centers and public clouds. It offers a variety of features such as load balancing, SSL/TLS offloading, content switching, application acceleration, and advanced security.

item.title: Adding NSX Networking to a VCD Tenancy using IP Spaces
item.description: Adding NSX Networking to a VCD Tenancy utilizing a Private Provider Gateway and Private IP Spaces

item.title: Centralized Point of Management (CPoM) in Cloud Director 10.4.1
item.description: Cloud Director Centralized Point of Management (CPoM) is a UI Plugin that enables providers to present dedicated vCenter instances to their customers.

item.title: New Branding Experience in Cloud Director 10.4.1
item.description: With vCD 10.4.1, branding your cloud services has never been easier. Learn about the new capabilities for creating and customizing custom themes in this post.
